statements: DELETE FROM hospital_reports WHERE hospital_name = 'Hospital A';
DELETE FROM hospital_reports WHERE report_id = 1 AND hospital_name = 'Hospital A' AND resource_utilization = 'Low';
DELETE FROM hospital_reports WHERE patient_outcomes = 'Improving' AND resource_utilization = 'Medium';
DELETE FROM hospital_reports WHERE hospital_name = 'Hospital B' AND (patient_outcomes = 'Stable' OR patient_outcomes = 'Declining');
DELETE FROM HospitalPerformance WHERE performance_rating < 2.5 AND resource_utilization > 0.8;
DELETE FROM HospitalPerformance WHERE performance_rating < 3.0 AND resource_utilization > 0.8
DELETE FROM PatientOutcomes WHERE mortality_status = FALSE AND admission_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM HospitalPerformance WHERE hospital_id NOT IN (SELECT hospital_id FROM PatientOutcomes)
DELETE FROM hospital_performance WHERE hospital_id = 1 AND performance_score < 80
DELETE FROM patient_outcomes WHERE patient_id = 100 AND outcome_score > 90
DELETE FROM Patient_Outcomes WHERE outcome_type = 'Surgery' AND discharge_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Resource_Utilization WHERE resource_type = 'Equipment' AND usage_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
DELETE FROM Patient WHERE patient_age > 60 AND patient_gender = 'Male';
